Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.3 Sanidassanaduka » 2.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.3.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.3.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Upanissaya
Cūḷantaraduka
Sanidassanaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Upanissaya
39.
624Sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo…pe… . Pakatūpanissayo—  vaṇṇasampadaṃ patthayamāno dānaṃ…pe…  sīlaṃ…pe…  uposathakammaṃ karoti, vaṇṇasampadā saddhāya…pe…  patthanāya…  kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
625Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—  ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo…pe… . Pakatūpanissayo—  saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti…pe…  samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti; sīlaṃ…pe…  senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti…pe…  saṃghaṃ bhindati; saddhā…pe…  senāsanaṃ saddhāya…pe…  phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< Samanantarādiup Purejāta >>
